application.doc: List the contents of the auxiliary files directory

param.name: recursive
param.doc: Should a recursive directory listing be returned? (true or false) Default: false

method.name: GET
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue a HTTP GET command on the Auxiliary Files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: contents
param.doc: This entry contains the contents of the directory as an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: A sequential identifier for the file.

param.name: type
param.doc: Specifies whether this element is a file or directory. Valid values are "file" or "dir".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of file. This information is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

param.name: sha256
param.doc: A sha256 checksum of the contents of the file.

param.name: children
param.doc: If the type is "Directory", this entry contains the content of the directory as an array. This field is only populated when the recursive option is specified in the request.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
